verses.verse: In the five<WH2568> and twentieth<WH6242> year<WH8141> of our captivity,<WH1546> in the beginning<WH7218> of the year,<WH8141> in the tenth<WH6218> day of the month,<WH2320> in the fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> year<WH8141> after<WH310> that<WH834> the city<WH5892> was smitten,<WH5221> in the selfsame<WH2088> <WH6106> day<WH3117> the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> upon<WH5921> me, and brought<WH935> me thither.<WH8033>

In the visions<WH4759> of God<WH430> brought<WH935> he me into<WH413> the land<WH776> of Israel,<WH3478> and set<WH5117> me upon<WH413> a very<WH3966> high<WH1364> mountain,<WH2022> by<WH5921> which was as the frame<WH4011> of a city<WH5892> on the south.<WH4480> <WH5045>

And he brought<WH935> me thither,<WH8033> and, behold,<WH2009> there was a man,<WH376> whose appearance<WH4758> was like the appearance<WH4758> of brass,<WH5178> with a line<WH6616> of flax<WH6593> in his hand,<WH3027> and a measuring<WH4060> reed;<WH7070> and he<WH1931> stood<WH5975> in the gate.<WH8179>

And the man<WH376> said<WH1696> unto<WH413> me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> behold<WH7200> with thine eyes,<WH5869> and hear<WH8085> with thine ears,<WH241> and set<WH7760> thine heart<WH3820> upon all<WH3605> that<WH834> I<WH589> shall show<WH7200> thee; for<WH3588> to the intent that<WH4616> I might show<WH7200> them unto thee art thou brought<WH935> hither:<WH2008> declare<WH5046> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> thou<WH859> seest<WH7200> to the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

And behold<WH2009> a wall<WH2346> on the outside<WH4480> <WH2351> of the house<WH1004> round about,<WH5439> <WH5439> and in the man's<WH376> hand<WH3027> a measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> of six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> long by the cubit<WH520> and a handbreadth:<WH2948> so he measured<WH4058> <WH853> the breadth<WH7341> of the building,<WH1146> one<WH259> reed;<WH7070> and the height,<WH6967> one<WH259> reed.<WH7070>

Then came<WH935> he unto<WH413> the gate<WH8179> which<WH834> looketh<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> and went up<WH5927> the stairs<WH4609> thereof, and measured<WH4058> <WH853> the threshold<WH5592> of the gate,<WH8179> which was one<WH259> reed<WH7070> broad;<WH7341> and the other<WH259> threshold<WH5592> of the gate, which was one<WH259> reed<WH7070> broad.<WH7341>

And every little chamber<WH8372> was one<WH259> reed<WH7070> long,<WH753> and one<WH259> reed<WH7070> broad;<WH7341> and between<WH996> the little chambers<WH8372> were five<WH2568> cubits;<WH520> and the threshold<WH5592> of the gate<WH8179> by<WH4480> <WH681> the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> within<WH1004> was one<WH259> reed.<WH7070>
He measured<WH4058> also<WH853> the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> within,<WH1004> one<WH259> reed.<WH7070>

Then measured<WH4058> he<WH853> the porch<WH197> of the gate,<WH8179> eight<WH8083> cubits;<WH520> and the posts<WH352> thereof, two<WH8147> cubits;<WH520> and the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> was inward.<WH1004>

And the little chambers<WH8372> of the gate<WH8179> eastward<WH1870> <WH6921> were three<WH7969> on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and three<WH7969> on that side;<WH4480> <WH6311> they three<WH7969> were of one<WH259> measure:<WH4060> and the posts<WH352> had one<WH259> measure<WH4060> on this side<WH4480> <WH6311> and on that side.<WH4480> <WH6311>

And he measured<WH4058> <WH853> the breadth<WH7341> of the entry<WH6607> of the gate,<WH8179> ten<WH6235> cubits;<WH520> and the length<WH753> of the gate,<WH8179> thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cubits.<WH520>

The space<WH1366> also before<WH6440> the little chambers<WH8372> was one<WH259> cubit<WH520> on this side, and the space<WH1366> was one<WH259> cubit<WH520> on that side:<WH4480> <WH6311> and the little chambers<WH8372> were six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> on that side.<WH4480> <WH6311>

He measured<WH4058> then<WH853> the gate<WH8179> from the roof<WH4480> <WH1406> of one little chamber<WH8372> to the roof<WH1406> of another: the breadth<WH7341> was five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> door<WH6607> against<WH5048> door.<WH6607>
He made<WH6213> also<WH853> posts<WH352> of threescore<WH8346> cubits,<WH520> even unto<WH413> the post<WH352> of the court<WH2691> round about<WH5439> <WH5439> the gate.<WH8179>
And from<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the gate<WH8179> of the entrance<WH2978> unto<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the porch<WH197> of the inner<WH6442> gate<WH8179> were fifty<WH2572> cubits.<WH520>

And there were narrow<WH331> windows<WH2474> to<WH413> the little chambers,<WH8372> and to<WH413> their posts<WH352> within<WH6441> the gate<WH8179> round about,<WH5439> <WH5439> and likewise<WH3651> to the porches:<WH361> and windows<WH2474> were round about<WH5439> <WH5439> inward:<WH6441> and upon<WH413> each post<WH352> were palm trees.<WH8561>

Then brought<WH935> he me into<WH413> the outward<WH2435> court,<WH2691> and, lo,<WH2009> there were chambers,<WH3957> and a pavement<WH7531> made<WH6213> for the court<WH2691> round about:<WH5439> <WH5439> thirty<WH7970> chambers<WH3957> were upon<WH413> the pavement.<WH7531>
And the pavement<WH7531> by<WH413> the side<WH3802> of the gates<WH8179> over against<WH5980> the length<WH753> of the gates<WH8179> was the lower<WH8481> pavement.<WH7531>

Then he measured<WH4058> the breadth<WH7341> from the forefront<WH4480> <WH6440> of the lower<WH8481> gate<WH8179> unto the forefront<WH6440> of the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> without,<WH4480> <WH2351> a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> eastward<WH6921> and northward.<WH6828>
And the gate<WH8179> of the outward<WH2435> court<WH2691> that<WH834> looked<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the north,<WH6828> he measured<WH4058> the length<WH753> thereof, and the breadth<WH7341> thereof.

And the little chambers<WH8372> thereof were three<WH7969> on this side<WH4480> <WH6311> and three<WH7969> on that side;<WH4480> <WH6311> and the posts<WH352> thereof and the porches<WH361> thereof were<WH1961> after the measure<WH4060> of the first<WH7223> gate:<WH8179> the length<WH753> thereof was fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> cubits.<WH520>

And their windows,<WH2474> and their porches,<WH361> and their palm trees,<WH8561> were after the measure<WH4060> of the gate<WH8179> that<WH834> looketh<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the east;<WH6921> and they went up<WH5927> unto it by seven<WH7651> steps;<WH4609> and the porches<WH361> thereof were before<WH6440> them.

And the gate<WH8179> of the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> was over against<WH5048> the gate<WH8179> toward the north,<WH6828> and toward the east;<WH6921> and he measured<WH4058> from gate<WH4480> <WH8179> to<WH413> gate<WH8179> a hundred<WH3967> cubits.<WH520>

After that he brought<WH1980> me toward<WH1870> the south,<WH1864> and behold<WH2009> a gate<WH8179> toward<WH1870> the south:<WH1864> and he measured<WH4058> the posts<WH352> thereof and the porches<WH361> thereof according to these<WH428> measures.<WH4060>

And there were windows<WH2474> in it and in the porches<WH361> thereof round about,<WH5439> <WH5439> like those<WH428> windows:<WH2474> the length<WH753> was fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> cubits.<WH520>

And there were seven<WH7651> steps<WH4609> to go up<WH5930> to it, and the porches<WH361> thereof were before<WH6440> them: and it had palm trees,<WH8561> one<WH259> on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and another<WH259> on that side,<WH4480> <WH6311> upon<WH413> the posts<WH352> thereof.

And there was a gate<WH8179> in the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> toward<WH1870> the south:<WH1864> and he measured<WH4058> from gate<WH4480> <WH8179> to<WH413> gate<WH8179> toward<WH1870> the south<WH1864> a hundred<WH3967> cubits.<WH520>

And he brought<WH935> me to<WH413> the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> by the south<WH1864> gate:<WH8179> and he measured<WH4058> <WH853> the south<WH1864> gate<WH8179> according to these<WH428> measures;<WH4060>

And the little chambers<WH8372> thereof, and the posts<WH352> thereof, and the porches<WH361> thereof, according to these<WH428> measures:<WH4060> and there were windows<WH2474> in it and in the porches<WH361> thereof round about:<WH5439> <WH5439> it was fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> broad.<WH7341>
And the porches<WH361> round about<WH5439> <WH5439> were five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> broad.<WH7341>

And the porches<WH361> thereof were toward<WH413> the utter<WH2435> court;<WH2691> and palm trees<WH8561> were upon<WH413> the posts<WH352> thereof: and the going up<WH4608> to it had eight<WH8083> steps.<WH4609>
And he brought<WH935> me into<WH413> the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> toward<WH1870> the east:<WH6921> and he measured<WH4058> <WH853> the gate<WH8179> according to these<WH428> measures.<WH4060>

And the little chambers<WH8372> thereof, and the posts<WH352> thereof, and the porches<WH361> thereof, were according to these<WH428> measures:<WH4060> and there were windows<WH2474> therein and in the porches<WH361> thereof round about:<WH5439> <WH5439> it was fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> broad.<WH7341>

And the porches<WH361> thereof were toward the outward<WH2435> court;<WH2691> and palm trees<WH8561> were upon<WH413> the posts<WH352> thereof, on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and on that side:<WH4480> <WH6311> and the going up<WH4608> to it had eight<WH8083> steps.<WH4609>
And he brought<WH935> me to<WH413> the north<WH6828> gate,<WH8179> and measured<WH4058> it according to these<WH428> measures;<WH4060>

The little chambers<WH8372> thereof, the posts<WH352> thereof, and the porches<WH361> thereof, and the windows<WH2474> to it round about:<WH5439> <WH5439> the length<WH753> was fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> cubits.<WH520>

And the posts<WH352> thereof were toward the utter<WH2435> court;<WH2691> and palm trees<WH8561> were upon<WH413> the posts<WH352> thereof, on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and on that side:<WH4480> <WH6311> and the going up<WH4608> to it had eight<WH8083> steps.<WH4609>
And the chambers<WH3957> and the entries<WH6607> thereof were by the posts<WH352> of the gates,<WH8179> where<WH8033> they washed<WH1740> <WH853> the burnt offering.<WH5930>

And in the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> were two<WH8147> tables<WH7979> on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and two<WH8147> tables<WH7979> on that side,<WH4480> <WH6311> to slay<WH7819> thereon<WH413> the burnt offering<WH5930> and the sin offering<WH2403> and the trespass offering.<WH817>

And at<WH413> the side<WH3802> without,<WH4480> <WH2351> as one goeth up<WH5927> to the entry<WH6607> of the north<WH6828> gate,<WH8179> were two<WH8147> tables;<WH7979> and on<WH413> the other<WH312> side,<WH3802> which<WH834> was at the porch<WH197> of the gate,<WH8179> were two<WH8147> tables.<WH7979>

Four <WH702> tables<WH7979> were on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and four<WH702> tables<WH7979> on that side,<WH4480> <WH6311> by the side<WH3802> of the gate;<WH8179> eight<WH8083> tables,<WH7979> whereupon<WH413> they slew<WH7819> their sacrifices.

And the four<WH702> tables<WH7979> were of hewn<WH1496> stone<WH68> for the burnt offering,<WH5930> of a<WH259> cubit<WH520> and a<WH259> half<WH2677> long,<WH753> and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> broad,<WH7341> and one<WH259> cubit<WH520> high:<WH1363> whereupon<WH413> also they laid<WH5117> <WH853> the instruments<WH3627> wherewith<WH834> they slew<WH7819> <WH853> the burnt offering<WH5930> and the sacrifice.<WH2077>
And within<WH1004> were hooks,<WH8240> a<WH259> hand broad,<WH2948> fastened<WH3559> round about:<WH5439> <WH5439> and upon<WH413> the tables<WH7979> was the flesh<WH1320> of the offering.<WH7133>

And without<WH4480> <WH2351> the inner<WH6442> gate<WH8179> were the chambers<WH3957> of the singers<WH7891> in the inner<WH6442> court,<WH2691> which<WH834> was at<WH413> the side<WH3802> of the north<WH6828> gate;<WH8179> and their prospect<WH6440> was toward<WH1870> the south:<WH1864> one<WH259> at<WH413> the side<WH3802> of the east<WH6921> gate<WH8179> having the prospect<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the north.<WH6828>

And he said<WH1696> unto<WH413> me, This<WH2090> chamber,<WH3957> whose<WH834> prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the south,<WH1864> is for the priests,<WH3548> the keepers<WH8104> of the charge<WH4931> of the house.<WH1004>

And the chamber<WH3957> whose<WH834> prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the north<WH6828> is for the priests,<WH3548> the keepers<WH8104> of the charge<WH4931> of the altar:<WH4196> these<WH1992> are the sons<WH1121> of Zadok<WH6659> among the sons<WH4480> <WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> which come near<WH7131> to<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> to minister<WH8334> unto him.

So he measured<WH4058> <WH853> the court,<WH2691> a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> broad,<WH7341> foursquare;<WH7251> and the altar<WH4196> that was before<WH6440> the house.<WH1004>

And he brought<WH935> me to<WH413> the porch<WH197> of the house,<WH1004> and measured<WH4058> each post<WH352> of the porch,<WH197> five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> on that side:<WH4480> <WH6311> and the breadth<WH7341> of the gate<WH8179> was three<WH7969> cubits<WH520> on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and three<WH7969> cubits<WH520> on that side.<WH4480> <WH6311>

The length<WH753> of the porch<WH197> was twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> eleven<WH6249> <WH6240> cubits;<WH520> and he brought me by the steps<WH4609> whereby<WH834> they went up<WH5927> to<WH413> it: and there were pillars<WH5982> by<WH413> the posts,<WH352> one<WH259> on this side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and another<WH259> on that side.<WH4480> <WH6311>
